description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 26 September 2011 (RN: 11/04767/FULL) for the: Use of three retail kiosks (Class A1) at 23-25 St Martin's Court as restaurant (Class A3), use of first floor 30 Charing Cross Road as restaurant (Class A3), extension within rear lightwell at ground and first floors, replacement of rear kitchen extract duct with new full height duct and installation of new shopfronts at 23-25 St Martin's Court and 28-30 Charing Cross Road, in connection with extension of existing restaurant use at basement and ground floor of 30 Charing Cross Road. Namely, to allow change use of basement storeroom from B1 to A3, basement vaults from A1 to A3, reduce width of door facing on to St Martin's Court, reconfigure and enlarge kitchen extract ducting in lightwell, install edge protection railing to roof of lightwell extension, insert roof hatch to lightwell extension, rectify inaccuracies relating to the windows on south elevation of lightwell extension at ground and first floors; introduction of a 70 degree pitch to ground floor roof of lightwell extension on western side; Amendment to the location and size of fixed roof light in lightwell extension and; replace arched steel windows to first floor of St Martin's Court elevation and shopfront alterations.
